item.description:
This is the night session of the Movie Marathon. We split the meetups so you could go to one if you couldn't make both. Please RSVP to both if you are going to both.

We booked the screening room at the Somerville Theater on March 20th! We'll probably take a break in between the afternoon and the evening session to pick up dinner around Davis Square, we have the room from 2pm to 11pm.

Because renting the screening room at the theater is not free, there is a charge to this meetup. All proceeds will go to rental and expenses related to the meetup.

I talked to theater and they said we can bring in whatever we want as long as it isn't hard liquor. Beer and hard cider are served on the premise as well :-)

The theme for this marathon will be a night of Trek.

List of movies for the Night Session:
at 6:30PM Galaxy Quest
at 9:00PM Star Trek (2009)
item.name: Somerville Theater Movie Marathon Night Session
